Welcome!  As winter approaches, consider setting up a drive session to improve
your winter driving skills. Whether you are a new or experienced driver, it
can be challenging to drive on our winter roads.  Not only can I give you some
basic tips, we can practice during the winter months.  
  
  
Basic Info: I provide private lessons in the Missoula area.  The new driver
will need to be 14 1/2 or older with a valid learner's license.  I will
provide the car and pick up and drop off at your location.  Most new drivers
will need between 8 and 12 hours with me to become proficient.  I charge $60
(subject to change) per hour.  
  
​Keep in mind that this is not a traditional Driver's Education class.  It
will only be behind the wheel practice.  
  
 **​ Please be aware that I will be unavailable for daily contact from
November 23rd through December 1st.  I will be checking my messages every
three days as I will be off grid during this time. **  
  
​Call or text for availability: 406-552-5950  
  
Experience: I have been teaching people (ages 13 to 83 years old) to drive for
over 24 years and I am certified by the state of Montana.  
  
  
  
Word search: driving lessons, driver's education, traffic education, private
driving lessons, teen driving lessons, adult driving lessons, student driver,
student driving lessons, Missoula Montana, Missoula county, winter driving
tips, winter driving in Missoula Montana, winter driving school.
